movies.title: Favourites of the Moon
movies.plot: Awarded the Special Jury Prize at the 41st Venice International Film Festival, this absurdist comedy, with its sprawling cast of crooks, thieves, anarchists, prostitutes, chief inspectors, art dealers, and inventors, calls to mind the bustling tapestries of Robert Altman. The story revolves around two objects, a rare set of 18th-century Limoges china, and a 19th century aristocratic portrait. As these items are passed, sold, or stolen from one character to another, a giddy round dance of excess begins to take shape, one which suggests that if history doesn't repeat itself, it certainly rhymes. Together with co-writer Gérard Brach, whose other co-writing credits include Repulsion and Tess, Otar Iosseliani uses a feather-light touch to expose the futility of class and social order, making a bagatelle of the concerns of rich and poor alike.
movies.simplePlot: Awarded the Special Jury Prize at the 41st Venice International Film Festival, this absurdist comedy, with its sprawling cast of crooks, thieves, anarchists, prostitutes, chief inspectors, ...

biography.bio: Katja Rupé was born on September 18, 1949 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress and director, known for Daniel the Wizard (2004), Favourites of the Moon (1984) and The Sternstein Manor (1976).
biography.name: Katja Rupé

biography.bio: Alix de Montaigu is an actress, known for Favourites of the Moon (1984) and Farewell, Home Sweet Home (1999).
biography.name: Alix de Montaigu

biography.bio: François Michel is an actor, known for Favourites of the Moon (1984) and Grand Illusion (1985).
biography.name: François Michel

biography.bio: Jean-Pierre Beauviala is an actor and producer, known for Cinéma Vérité: Defining the Moment (2000), La rouge et la noire (2011) and Favourites of the Moon (1984).
biography.name: Jean-Pierre Beauviala

biography.bio: Pascal Aubier was born on January 7, 1943 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for Le fils de Gascogne (1995), Les petits coins (1986) and L'apparition (1986).
biography.name: Pascal Aubier

biography.bio: Christiane Bailly is an actress, known for Favourites of the Moon (1984) and Dim Dam Dom (1965).
biography.name: Christiane Bailly

biography.bio: Bernard Eisenschitz is an actor and director, known for Wings of Desire (1987), Les voyages de L'Atalante (2001) and Favourites of the Moon (1984).
biography.name: Bernard Eisenschitz

biography.bio: Hans Peter Cloos is an actor and director, known for L'Allemagne en automne (1978), Favourites of the Moon (1984) and Déjeuner chez Wittgenstein (2004).
biography.name: Hans Peter Cloos

biography.bio: Maïté Nahyr was born on October 25, 1947 in Wilrijk, Belgium as Nahyr Noemi Marguerit Meerbergen. She was an actress, known for Boy Meets Girl (1984), The Tenant (1976) and Dá Viss (1993). She died on August 19, 2012 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France.
biography.name: Maïté Nahyr

biography.bio: Mathieu Amalric was born on October 25, 1965 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He is an actor and director, known for The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014), The Diving Bell and the Butterfly (2007) and Quantum of Solace (2008).
biography.name: Mathieu Amalric

biography.bio: László Szabó was born on March 24, 1936 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor and director, known for The Unbearable Lightness of Being (1988), Les nuits de la pleine lune (1984) and Made in U.S.A (1966).
biography.name: László Szabó

biography.bio: Yannick Carpentier is an actor, known for Farewell, Home Sweet Home (1999), La chasse aux papillons (1992) and Lundi matin (2002).
biography.name: Yannick Carpentier

biography.bio: Fanny Dupin is an actress, known for Favourites of the Moon (1984).
biography.name: Fanny Dupin

biography.bio: Marie Parra Aledo is an actress, known for Favourites of the Moon (1984).
biography.name: Marie Parra Aledo

biography.bio: Gabriella Sheer is an actress, known for Favourites of the Moon (1984), Life Is a Bed of Roses (1983) and Marie Ward - Zwischen Galgen und Glorie (1985).
biography.name: Gabriella Sheer
